data.title: Public Domain Media Search Engine Public Domain Search
data.meta_description: Download Images of  - Free for commercial use, no attribution required. From: A scene from "Lady Frederick" (SAYRE 13631), to Beaut Damned 1922 Lobby Card 3. Find  images dated from 1909 to 1940.
data.meta_site_name: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.text:
A scene from "Lady Frederick" (SAYRE 13631)

A scene from "Lady Frederick," which opened July 4, 1909, at the Moore Theater, Seattle. Includes Ethel Barrymore (seated), Arthur Elliott (with beard), and Kenneth Harlan (right). Subjects: plays, actresses, actors

A scene from "The Price of a Good Time" (SAYRE 13637)

A scene from the American drama film The Price of a Good Time (1917), which played at the Liberty Theater, Seattle. Includes Mildred Harris (in stripes). Date stamped Feb. 28, 1918. Subjects: actresses, moti ... More

Twinkletoes lobby card - Vintage movie public domain poster

Lobby card for the film Twinkletoes (1926). Public domain photograph of a movie film poster advertisement, free to use, no copyright restrictions image - Picryl description

The Flame of the Yukon (1917) - 2

Newspaper ad for the American drama film The Flame of the Yukon (1917) with Kenneth Harlan and an unidentified actor, on page 3 of the April 17, 1920 Duluth Herald.

I Am the Law (1922) - 1. Silent film movie advertisement

Advertisement for the American drama film I Am the Law (1922) with Kenneth Harlan and Alice Lake, on page 8 of the June 1922 Photoplay Magazine.

Her Body in Bond - Vintage movie public domain poster

April Showers lobby card - Vintage movie public domain poster

Lobby card for the American film April Showers (1923). The item has no copyright markings on it as can be seen in the links above. At bottom left is Country of origin USA. United States Copyright Office page 2 ... More

Beaut Damned 1922 Lobby Card 1

First of six lobby cards for the lost American drama film The Beautiful And Damned (1922).

Beaut Damned 1922 Lobby Card 2

Second of six lobby cards for the lost American drama film The Beautiful And Damned (1922).

The Beautiful and Damned (1922) - 2
